dmca.title: Google DMCA - Curry Recipes
dmca.body:
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Dear Sir/Madam,

The site www.53280.com is a copyright infringement of the site www.curry-recipes.net and I've found out Google seems to consider some of my documents the ones to be the copies instead of the infringing pages. Dreamhost accepted my DMCA complaint but now they are hosted somewhere in China and I can do nothing about it.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text and logo that appears on:

http://www.curry-recipes.net/
http://appetizer.curry-recipes.net/
http://soup.curry-recipes.net/
http://indian.curry-recipes.net/
http://salad.curry-recipes.net/
http://seafood.curry-recipes.net/
http://chinese.curry-recipes.net/
http://greek.curry-recipes.net/
http://texmex.curry-recipes.net/
http://italian.curry-recipes.net/
http://pasta.curry-recipes.net/
http://mexican.curry-recipes.net/
http://icecream.curry-recipes.net/
http://bread.curry-recipes.net/
http://yeastbread.curry-recipes.net/
http://biscuit.curry-recipes.net/
http://crockpot.curry-recipes.net/
http://thanksgiving.curry-recipes.net/
http://arab.curry-recipes.net/

and all subpages of those subdomains.

The infringing web pages are:

http://www.53280.com/
http://www.53280.com/appetizerfood/
http://www.53280.com/soup/
http://www.53280.com/indianfood/
http://www.53280.com/saladfood/
http://www.53280.com/seafood/
http://www.53280.com/chinesefood/
http://www.53280.com/greekfood/
http://www.53280.com/texmexfood/
http://www.53280.com/italianfood/
http://www.53280.com/pastafood/
http://www.53280.com/mexicanfood/
http://www.53280.com/icecream/
http://www.53280.com/breadfood/
http://www.53280.com/yeastbreadfood/
http://www.53280.com/biscuitfood/
http://www.53280.com/crockpotfood/
http://www.53280.com/thanksgiving/
http://www.53280.com/arabfood/

and all subpages of those directories.

My contact information: info@curry-recipes.net

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Julio C
